cause.description:
Knox County Health Clinic is a grassroots, volunteer based organization which offers free or low-cost medical, dental, and prescription assistance services to the uninsured, the under-insured, and those who cannot afford to pay for basic health care.
For more information, see the website: www.knoxclinic.org
1. No one should lack access to basic health care.
cause.mission: provide health care services for the low income and uninsured of Knox County
cause.name: Knox County Health Clinic
